column5: We provide a unique Master’s education in Materials Chemistry, offering the opportunity to carry out a 12-month research project from a selection that covers all aspects of Materials Chemistry.Optional modules enable you to gain specialist knowledge of core areas such as:supramolecular and nanochemistrypolymer chemistryinorganic materials chemistryBoth synthesis and characterisation are integral to the teaching around these areas.Materials Chemistry is a key multidisciplinary area, and a growth area for both academic and industrial research. Employment prospects in this area are excellent - the programme will prepare you for a career in industrial or academic research and development, or in production or manufacturing roles.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
